root.name: Blood Beach
root.description: Blood Beach is an arcade style WW2 sim where the player is tasked with the defense of a remote listening post in the Solomon islands. Make use of an arsenal including the M2 BMG, Bofors 40mm, and Thompson SMG. The game features 20 stages, each with multiple waves of enemies to defeat. On the iPhone players have the option to use touch controls, virtual analog stick, or virtual directional pad control with options for sensitivity. EnemiesThe player must defend against Imperial Japanese Navy forces in their relentless push to recapture the Solomon’s.
